variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB1
variable.description: Q1. A. Active living. During the past year how many minutes a day do you usually walk and/or bicycle to and from work, school or errands? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 5 but less than 15 minutes
At least 15 but less than 30 minutes
At least 30 but less than 45 minutes

variable.name: PACB2
variable.description: Q2. A. Active living. During the pas year during leisure time, how often did you walk for at least 15 minutes at a time? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB3
variable.description: Q3. A. Active living. During the last year during leisure time, how often did you bike for at least 15 minutes at a time? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB4
variable.description: Q4. A. Active living. During the past year during leisure time, how often do you sweat from exertion? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB5
variable.description: Q5. A. Active living. During the past year during the past year, how often did you watch television? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 1 hour a week but less than 7 hours
At least 1 hour a day but less than 2 hours
At least 2 hours a day but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACB6
variable.description: Q6. B. Occupational activities. Did you work for pay or do volunteer work during the past year? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB7
variable.description: Q7. B. Occupational activities. In comparison with other men (women) of your age, do you think your work (volunteer work) is physically much lighter, lighter, the same as, heavier, or much heavier? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB8
variable.description: Q8. B. Occupational activities. After work are you physically tired? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB9A
variable.description: Q9a. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: sit [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB9B
variable.description: Q9b. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: stand: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB9C
variable.description: Q9c. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: walk: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB9D
variable.description: Q9d. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: lift heavy loads: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB9E
variable.description: Q9e. B. Occupational activities. When you are working how often do you do each of the following: sweat from exertion: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB10
variable.description: Q10. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend caring for children under 5 years of age or for a disabled child or elderly person? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 20 hours per week

variable.name: PACB11
variable.description: Q11. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend preparing meals or cleaning up from meals? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 0.5 hour but less than 1 hour per day
At least 1 hour but less than 1.5 hour per day
At least 1.5 hour but less than 2 hours per day

variable.name: PACB12
variable.description: Q12. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend doing major cleaning activities such as shampooing carpets, waxing floors, washing windows or washing a car or other vehicle? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB13
variable.description: Q13. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend doing routine cleaning such as dusting, laundry, vacuuming, changing bed sheets or grocery shopping and pushing a cart? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB14
variable.description: Q14. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend doing gardening or yard work, such as mowing lawn or raking leaves? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB15
variable.description: Q15. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend doing heavy outdoor work such as chopping wood, tilling soil, shoveling or bailing hay? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB16
variable.description: Q16. C. Home, family, yard, and garden. During the past year (12 months) how much time did you spend doing major home decoration or repair, such as plumbing , tiling, painting, or building? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB17
variable.description: Q17. D. Sports and exercise. During the past year did you participate in any of these activities or in any other similar activities not included on the list? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB18
variable.description: Q18. D. Sports and exercise. How often did you play sports or exercise during the past year? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB19A
variable.description: Q19a. D. Sports and exercise. Which sport or exercise did you do most frequently? Is this activity on the code list? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB19B
variable.description: Q19b. D. Sports and exercise. Which sport or exercise did you do most frequently? Code for most frequent sport or exercise: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB19C
variable.description: Q19c. D. Sports and exercise. Which sport or exercise did you do most frequently? If the activity is not coded, specify the activity: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB20
variable.description: Q20. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB21
variable.description: Q21. D. Sports and exercise. How many hours a week did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACB22A
variable.description: Q22a. D. Sports and exercise. What was the second most frequent sport or exercise you did? Is this activity on the code list? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB22B
variable.description: Q22b. D. Sports and exercise. What was the second most frequent sport or exercise you did? Code for the second most frequent sport or exercise: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB23
variable.description: Q23. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB24
variable.description: Q24. D. Sports and exercise. How many hours a week did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACB25A
variable.description: Q25a. D. Sports and exercise. What was the third most frequent sport or exercise you did? Is this activity on the code list? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB25B
variable.description: Q25b. D. Sports and exercise. What was the third most frequent sport or exercise you did? Code for the third most frequent sport or exercise: [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB26
variable.description: Q26. D. Sports and exercise. How many months in the past year did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACB27
variable.description: Q27. D. Sports and exercise. How many hours a week did you do this activity? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
variable.value: At least 1 but less than 2 hours
At least 2 but less than 3 hours
At least 3 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PACB28
variable.description: Q28. D. Sports and exercise. In comparison with others of your own age, do you think your recreational activity is much less, less, the same as, more, or much more? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: PACBflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 9] [Physical Activity Form]
